attributes.action: Raise the amount of Disability Living Allowance properly in line with inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year inflation raises the costs of everything people need to survive.
When it comes to increasing the amount of DLA in line with inflation the number miraculously drops but then jumps up again the following month.
Disabled people are struggling to survive because the amount they recieve is not properly in line with inflation.
